credit_line: Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen
title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: silk, metal thread
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
description: Pale blue-green silk grosgrain with broad ribbon-like serpentine brocaded in silver and gold frisee, ivory and tan silks. Large floral sprays in polychrome silks and metal spring. Ship, with floral sprays tied to mast, in curve of serpentine.
name: Fragment
